column4: to anyone who might care, i just did a fresh install of karmic. ubuntu software centre isn't letting me download compizconfig, even though i've changed the settings in the usual way which lets me get most extra programs. pretty much everything is ticked on software sources.
sorry, a total terminal noob, would it be sudo apt-get [whatever]?
Technically yes. Most commonly used are "sudo apt-get install PACKAGE", "sudo apt-get remove PACKAGE" and "sudo apt-get update"
Use "apt-cache search SOMETHING" to search for packages, by the way.
